text:
Hi Guys,
Is there way to fetch blog posts which are most viewed but with specific time period. For example I would like to set the module to display the most view posts that were published within the last 12 months/6 months/1 months ?

I tried this '{% set pop_posts = blog_popular_posts(<http://item.blog|item.blog>, item.number_field, "popular_past_month") %}' but it always showing the post from last 12 months
